description:
Stop mud in its tracks. This water bottle packs multiple layers of insulation into a lightweight, flexible bottle to deliver thirst-quenching cool water when you need it. The muck guard protects the self-sealing valve to stop mud getting into your precious liquid.

  • Triple-layered insulation keeps your water cooler for longer
  • Finger grooves and ultra-light material for extra grip and easy squeeze
  • Muckguard™ protects valve from mud and dust build up
  • Spill-proof nozzle is self-sealing to prevent leaks
  • Removeable valve system is easy to clean and prevents grunge buildup
name: Polar Bottle Breakaway Muck Insulated 590ml Water Bottle
